Title: Dexter
Plot: Dexter is a forensic expert in blood patterns who works with the Miami Police Department. He is also a serial killer, who kills people that the police can't bring to justice. He has to hide his double life from his sister, his girlfriend and his co-workers. He is intrigued by a killer who has found a way to kill girls without leaving blood behind.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Renier J. Murillo, Susie Taylor, Devon Graye, Marc Macaulay,  Justin Kane,  Neeona Neel,  Jeanne Tidwell,  Roy Rutland,  Jacqueline Martinez,  Dennis Depew,  Patrick Michael Buckley, Ethan Smith, Christina Robins
